EmailTemplate.name: 10_09_2014 EA Program - Customers.EA Program - Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Go to VMworld with VMTurbo Early Access | Join the Circle of Trust
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Announcing the VMTurbo® Early Access Incentive Program!
Dear {{Lead.First Name:default=}}
You heard it first during our Octurbofest VMTurbo User Group meeting in Boston, MA on October 8, and now read about it in the Green Circle <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/community/products/blog/2014/10/08/the-early-access-incentive-program-announcement/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eaprogram&utm_content=100914>.
Green Circle VMTurbo Customers are invited to participate in a great incentive program to recognize the support we have received from our Valuable Contributors and give you the opportunity to receive some Recognition and Reward!
The Participant – Green Level
- Who? Any customer! Unlimited numbers of participants
- What do you have to do?
- Participate & Provide feedback
- What do you get?
- Bragging rights Special icon in your name & points - Reward: Limited Edition T–Shirt
The Consultant / Circle of Trust – Platinum Level
- Who? Any customer! Will be limited to our Top 10 Contributors (one per Company)
- What do you have to do?
- Participate & Provide feedback
- What do you get?
- Even more bragging rights Plus a Very Special icon in your name & points - Reward: VMWorld 2015 Conference Pass
For more details on the program and how to get in, visit the VMTurbo Green Circle’s Announcement here <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/community/products/blog/2014/10/08/the-early-access-incentive-program-announcement/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eaprogram&utm_content=100914>. A VMTurbo Customer but not a member of the Green Circle yet? Start here <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eaprogram&utm_content=100914>.
Any questions, contact Eva Tuczai <mailto:eva.tuczai@vmturbo.com&subject=VMTurbo EA Program>, VMTurbo Product Management.
Stay Green,
Shmuel Kliger Founder, President & CTO VMTurbo, Inc. 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
